channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 15th June
item.description:
Vehicle appears abandoned. Passenger window is smashed in, rear door is broken, there is a lot of trash visible inside the vehicle. It is also parked illegally on a yellow line.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queens Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Park Hall Road SE21 at Martell Road junction on, 15th June
item.description:
Park Hall Road SE21 at Martell Road junction on the side of “Park Court” green plastic Lambeth road sweeper’s road sweeping bin bag graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/place/10+Park+Hall+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8DW/@51.4350885,-0.0950723,3a,47.8y,199.02h,77.79t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1s-nKjly8hGRVjJzdPD7_HlQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D12.209812025719316%26panoid%3D-nKjly8hGRVjJzdPD7_HlQ%26yaw%3D199.016249042628!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x48760400be7aca43:0x6e675e98886f1ec0!8m2!3d51.4350144!4d-0.0948247!16s%2Fg%2F11bw3gz4w3?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYxMS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martell Road, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on Covid Memorial, 15th June
item.description:
Disrespectful graffiti on Covid memorial. Disgusting and disgraceful for this to be left there. Makes Britain look so shameful to visitors as well as the families of the victims

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Westminster Bridge Road, Lambeth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Park Hall Road SE21 re house number 10 cream, 15th June
item.description:
Park Hall Road SE21 re house number 10 cream coloured painted concrete wall end of front wall that bends round to face Martell Road – red graffiti. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/place/10+Park+Hall+Rd,+Norwood,+London+SE21+8DW/@51.4350885,-0.0950723,3a,75y,120.92h,76.8t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1s-nKjly8hGRVjJzdPD7_HlQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D13.204352946485514%26panoid%3D-nKjly8hGRVjJzdPD7_HlQ%26yaw%3D120.91503432437948!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x48760400be7aca43:0x6e675e98886f1ec0!8m2!3d51.4350144!4d-0.0948247!16s%2Fg%2F11bw3gz4w3?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDYxMS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
